answers.answer: I wouldn't worry....just expect a bigger baby. Are you gestational diabetic?

Hi..I had my scan at 28 weeks and my baby was 30 weeks,.I had my ogtt at 16 weeks.,doc advised me for another ogtt at 28 weeks coz of big baby and it's normal.they told not to worry.,baby is constitutionally big.I'm 31 weeks now n have growth scan next week.
no3ontheway I passed my test for gestational diabetes already... My husband when he was born measured 9 lbs 11 oZ my daughter was 7 lbs I'm confused

Is it you belly they are measuring? I wouldn't worry if they didn't tell you there was an issue . Measurements can be off and doctored are not GODs so they can be wrong. Baby will come when he/she is ready and that all you can expect
Oh and I should mention my scan said I was having a 10 lb baby and be cause our 8.3 so they can be wrong
I'm 33 weeks and had a u/s today. He weighs 5 lbs 2 oz. Average/normal size.
If you passed the glucose test....don't worry....like I said just expect s little bigger bundle. ..

question: I'm 32 weeks baby measures 33 weeks  and every 6 weeks I have to go for a growth scan...well today they took measuresurments and he measures 35 weeks and he weighs 5 lbs 4 onces... I'm very confused should I worry should I call my dr????
title: Serious question
